metaDescription: Feel free to contact me if you're looking for a communicative front-end developer who is passionate about creating great user experiences or just want to have a chat.

hero.name: Dmytro Mamutov
hero.description: I enjoy building solid and user-friendly web applications using my experience in TypeScript, React and Next.js.

about.title: 2+ years of work experience in making responsive and cross-browser websites
about.description: I like to do my job to the best of my abilities and always work honestly and responsibly on all of my projects.

i1.title: Front-end Development
i1.subtitle: I have extensive knowledge of HTML, CSS & JavaScript (ES6), TypeScript and experience with React, Next.js. Add ambition, endless curiosity and a GTD‑mindset and you have a pretty complete picture of me.

i2.title: Fast Support
i2.description: I aim to be as available and supportive as I can to my clients. Feel free to contact me directly with questions or requests.

i3.title: SEO
i3.description: Using my expertise along with handy tools I strive for a high SEO score, ensuring higher visibility on search sites such as Google.

questions.title: Four things you probably like to know from me

q1.title: Do you have experience with <technology X>?
q1.text: I am a real hands-on worker and I am constantly experimenting with new techniques and tools. So I'm used to making things my own quickly. Are you looking for very specific skills? Please contact me to see if I can help you with that!

q2.title: Where are you located? Do you work remotely?
q2.text: A year ago I exchanged Zaporizhzhia for Lviv in the Ukraine. Is Lviv too far away from your organization? No problem, I'm used to working remotely. A hybrid model (for example x days in the office) is also possible.

q3.title: What was this site built with?
q3.text: React framework Next.js, TypeScript and CSS modules. For animations I used Gsap library.

q4.title: Ok, enough about your work, what do you do when you're not in front of your laptop?
q4.text: I like to work out in the gym and walking through the old part of the city. I also enjoy playing soccer and watching soccer games. In my spare time I like to work on one of my side projects. I really enjoy making tools that make live just a little bit easier.

e1.toolingMore: Javascript, Typescript, React, Next.js, Formik, SCSS, Gsap, Git, Webpack, Figma

w1.text: Develop new features and optimisations throughout the entire website

w2.text: Develop, optimise and maintain new pages

w4.text: Develop a website with courses for future employees

experience.botomText: These are just a few of the technologies I’ve worked with. Are you looking for specific skills? Don't hesitate to ask!

w1.title: S-PRO website
w1.description: S-PRO is a software development & consulting company.

w2.title: S-PRO academy
